doctor.name: Dr. Sarwat Rahman
doctor.info: Dr. Sarwat Rahman is a Neuro-Ophthalmologist in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS, DO (DU). She is a Consultant, Neuro-Ophthalmology at Bangladesh Eye Hospital & Institute. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Bangladesh Eye Hospital, Dhanmondi. Practicing hour of Dr. Sarwat Rahman at Bangladesh Eye Hospital, Dhanmondi is 5pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
